_sText:
SURF LOST CIVILIZATION  //   by DESE

Each round starts in an area where one has to choose the equipment

Available equipment:
-	SCOUT
-	M4A1 (ct) / AK47 (t)
-	M249 PARA
-	AUG (ct) / SG552 (t)
-	M3 SUPERSHOTGUN
-	P90 / 
All weapon mods are combined with a deagle and knife, except SCOUT: gravity 500 and no deagle / 
1 AWP can be found in game with all mods / 
Landing in jail means losing all weapons except knife: regain your weapons by dropping in to the temple!

Players have 1 minute, after 1 minute random equipment will be chosen / 
As soon a player gets there, all the other players are gathered to wait until the equipment is chosen / 
The one who gets to choose has 25 seconds to do so, else random equipment will be chosen

25 seconds surf area spawn protection / 
Healing possibility on highest point of the map / 
Ammo charge zone

Skybox mpa27 by KARATEKAEFER
